text: kanite befitimi keketemochi sewochi wedenerisu ra’iyi yeminaweridilachewi yehonuni wenidochini iniji alilakinimi፡፡ bemidiri layi ayihedumina ye’ineziyani ke’inesu befiti yeneberutini sewochi mech’eresha ayimeleketumini yemech’ereshayitumi ageri le’ineziya letet’enek’ek’uti be’irigit’i yeteshalechi nati፤ atawik’umini
